subject: p10933609
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. The heart size and mediastinum are stable. The right upper lobe consolidation appears to be progressed, concerning for developing infectious process such as right upper lobe pneumonia, and potentially there is also a focus of infection in the right lower lobe.
